history.noSessionsDesc: Your practice sessions will appear here once you start practicing. Try the 'Voice Mode' to get started!
history.noJournalsDesc: Keep track of your progress by adding journal entries.

coach.initialMessage: Hi! I'm your AI Vocal Coach. Ask me about your progress, or for tips on resonance and pitch!
coach.clearedMessage: Chat cleared. What's on your mind?
coach.errorProcessing: I encountered an error processing your request.
coach.title: AI Vocal Coach
coach.description: I'm here to help you with your voice training. Ask me anything!
coach.observationText: I noticed your pitch was a bit low in the last session. Try the 'Pitch Staircase' exercise to warm up!
coach.suggestion1: How do I raise my pitch?
coach.disclaimer: Curriculum based on WPATH & SES-VMTW guidelines.
coach.goalPlaceholder: What do you want to achieve with your voice?

library.noRecordingsDesc: You haven't saved any pitch references yet. Use the Pitch Pipe to save your target notes.
library.brightResonanceDesc: Making the vocal tract smaller (like a trumpet). Think of smiling or making an 'Eeee' sound.
library.brightResonanceSpeech: Bright resonance sounds sharp, buzzy, and forward. Eeeeeee.
library.darkResonanceDesc: Making the vocal tract larger (like a cello). Think of yawning or making an 'Oooo' sound.
library.darkResonanceSpeech: Dark resonance sounds hollow, deep, and warm. Oooooooo.
library.thinWeightDesc: Light vocal fold contact. Sounds soft, gentle, or breathy.
library.thinWeightSpeech: Thin weight is soft and light, like a whisper.
library.thickWeightDesc: Heavy vocal fold contact. Sounds buzzy, loud, or strained.
library.thickWeightSpeech: Thick weight is heavy and buzzy, like a shout.
